main event: An object was observed in the sky in Minneapolis, Minnesota, on April 7, 1967, for 40 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as round, the size of a basketball, and gray or brown in color., The object moved erratically and changed directions abruptly., No sound was heard during the observation., The observers maintained visual contact for several minutes., The object disappeared below the horizon.
sighted object: one round object, described as the size of a basketball
